column5: GREAT College Station location: 1.5 miles from A&M Campus - Perfect for Aggie Gamedays, Holidays, Reunions, Ring Ceremonies, Graduations, Family Weekends, Move-in, Weekend Getaways - 4BR/2.5 bath, sleeps up to 11, full kitchen, large open living space, dining room table seats 10, large back deck and back yard backs up to Bee Creek  AMAZING nearby amenities: Walking/biking trails, 5 min walk to Bee Creek Park and Adamson Waterpark
